By checking here, you are consenting to the use of your electronic signature instead of an original paper signature. Instead, you have the right to request that you sign a printed copy. By signing here, you waive that right. After consent, you can, upon written request, obtain a hard copy of an electronic record. No fee will be charged for such a copy and no special hardware or software is required to view it. Your agreement to use an electronic signature with us for any document will continue until such time as you notify us in writing that you no longer wish to use an electronic signature. There is no penalty for withdrawing your consent. You should always ensure that we have a current email address to contact you regarding any changes, if necessary.

string-array.name: aviso_datos
string-array.item: Thank you for your interest in Boulder Corp. For us, your privacy and comfort is very important and we want you to know, through this Privacy Notice, how and for what we use the information of our visitors.

Boulder Corp, climbing, is committed to respecting your privacy and the Personal Data Protection Law. All information provided that is considered personal data, according to the Law, it will be duly and carefully treated and preserved under our responsibility in computer systems, which may also be guarded in computer systems located in the cloud.
The treatment and use of your personal data by Boulder Corp, climbing, It will be carried out in accordance with the conditions and purposes of this Notice, through this contract / form application.
In case it is required to use your personal data for different purposes to those indicated in this Notice, we will contact you in order to request your authorization.

We request your information in order to identify you, locate you, communicate, contact you, send you information, comply with obligations that we have contracted with you and create databases that will be used to offer you products and / or services from BoulderCorp, climbing, that may be of interest to you and / or to third parties.
The use of personal and sensitive data will be directly related with the type of interaction you have with Boulder Corp, climbing, whether commercial, labor, civil, commercial or of any other nature.
The timing of the handling of personal data and / or sensitive data will be indefinite from the date they were provided.

Personal data that we request directly and through our application page: a) Name b) Email c) Telephone d) Date of birth e) Emergency contact details Once you deliver to Boulder Corp, upload your personal data, These will be kept in different secure media, whose access will only be limited to natural and / or legal persons with whom Boulder Corp, climbing, have any relationship.

We will have the appropriate security measures to protect the use of your personal data by unauthorized third parties. In case any authority is required, Your personal data may be made available to them, in strict compliance with the Law.

The treatment of your personal data, which you have made available to Boulder Corp, climbing, may be carried out in accordance with these terms and conditions, so from this moment it is understood that you expressly authorize Boulder Corp, climbing, for its use, as long as you don\'t express your opposition through any of the means indicated by the Law.

You have the right to access your personal data and the details of their treatment, as well as correct them, if they are inaccurate or incomplete; cancel them when you consider that they are not required for any of the purposes indicated in this Notice. If they are being used for non-consensual purposes or if the contractual relationship has ended or service can direct an opposition request to the counter of Boulder Corp, climbing or through social networks.
We promise not to process this data for purposes other than the contract or specific agreement for which they have been provided with your consent.

We reserve the right to make, at any time, modifications and / or updates to this Notice, according to new legislation, internal policies or new requirements for the offer of our services or products.

string-array.name: contract_1
string-array.item: DISCLAIMER

declare voluntarily, freely and spontaneously, that I wish to use each and every one of the facilities from the BOULDER CORP Climbing Gym and / or participate in other activities anywhere, whether indoors or outdoors, that are sponsored by or involving BOULDER CORP climbing. In consideration of BOULDER CORP climbing that I allows you to use the Facility and / or allow me to participate in activities, I have agreed to run this Agreement for Release of Liability, Assumption of Risk, Indemnification and Participation (the "Boundary").

From me, from my family members, administrators and legal representatives I declare that I am physically and mentally capable of participating in all BOULDER CORP climbing activities. and I assign the following:

string-array.name: contract_2
string-array.item: RISK RECOGNITION

I acknowledge that rock climbing and / or bouldering either indoors and / or outdoors is dangerous, including but not limited to the hazards associated with climbing, descend, fall and "spear". I understand that no amount of care, caution, Training or experience can eliminate the hazards associated with these and other related activities.

I understand that climbing equipment, facilities or grips may be damaged or defective. If any grip or part of the BOULDER CORP climbing installation is damaged while I am using it, I will communicate it to the BOULDER CORP climbing staff in charge so they can evaluate the damage.
I have read and agree to abide by the rules listed below at this exemption, as well as other rules that may be posted in all facilities or climbing sites.

I acknowledge that any climbing instructions that may receive from Released Parties is general in nature and may not be apply to all climbing conditions. I understand that any instruction that I receive does not prepare me to climb unsupervised.

string-array.name: contract_3
string-array.item: Bouldering Rules
Everyone must sign in at the front desk and go through an orientation before using the facilities if they wish.
Everyone must sign a disclaimer. Anyone under the age of 18 must have the liability exemption signed by a parent or legal guardian..

When climbing, a minimum of one person per climber is recommended to help "spot" or redirect a falling climber. Climbers recognize that Boulder is very dangerous. Using a spotter may not prevent injury. Observers understand that they can be injured by "spouting" or redirecting a falling climber.
Parents and legal guardians of guests under the age of 13 must directly supervise your children / guests at all times.
Don\'t climb over the climbing wall structure. Only staff members can be behind the climbing wall.
Personal items are not allowed on padded surfaces. Water bottles, bags, etc., must be stored in the cubicles provided by BOULDER CORP climbing.
BOULDER CORP climbing is not responsible for lost or stolen items.
Climbing under the influence of intoxicating substances or controlled, including alcohol or drugs of any kind, regardless of whether they were prescribed by a doctor or not.
We reserve the right to add to the above list what we deem appropriate in an effort to provide a safe environment for our customers.

string-array.name: contract_4
string-array.item: ASSUMPTION OF RISK AND RELEASE OF LIABILITY

If I suffer any type of injury, damage or accident, I will inform BOULDER CORP Climbing. If I require medical attention, without any responsibility from the BOULDER CORP Climbing gym, I accept that first aid will be applied to me and if necessary I will be transferred to a hospital center and that the expenses that are generated will be fully covered by the undersigned.

I EXPRESSLY ASSUME ALL KNOWN AND UNKNOWN RISKS ASSOCIATED WITH MY PARTICIPATION OR THE USE OF ANY AND ALL FACILITIES OR ACTIVITIES, INCLUDING THE RISKS OF INJURY, PARALYSIS OR DEATH. MY PARTICIPATION AND USE IS PURELY VOLUNTARY AND I CHOOSE TO DO SO NOTWITHSTANDING RISKS. I AGREE TO RELEASE BOULDER CORP CLIMBING AND ANY OF ITS RESPECTIVE MEMBERS FOREVER, OFFICIALS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, REPRESENTATIVES, SHAREHOLDERS, AS WELL AS ANY OTHER PERSON, CORPORATION, OWNERS AND OWNERS, FROM AND AGAINST ALL DAMAGES, ACTIONS, CLAIMS AND LIABILITIES, WHETHER KNOWN OR UNKNOWN, IN ADVANCE, SUSPECTED OR NON-SUSTAINED, RELATED TO ANY ACTIVITY OR EVOLUTION OF EVOLUTION OR DERIVATIVES OF BOULDER CORP CLIMBING OR ANY OF THE RELEASED PARTS.

string-array.name: contract_6
string-array.item: COMPENSATION AGREEMENT

I agree that this responsive will continue in force in perpetuity or until cancel or modify by written agreement, so that each time you use the facilities or participate in any activity, this responsive letter will remain in effect.

If the participant is a minor: I declare that I am the parent or legal guardian of the minor mentioned in this letter and I give my consent to use the facilities and / or participate in activities within them. In consideration of BOULDER CORP Climbing that allows the aforementioned minor to participate in activities and / or use the facility, I acknowledge that I am familiar with, and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement. I, in my name and the minor mentioned in the present, agree to resign, release, indemnify and exempt of responsibility to BOULDER CORP Climbing of and of all claims, debts, expenses, demands, damages and responsibilities of all kinds and nature, known or unknown, in law or equity, that said minor has or may have, that arise or are in any way related to the participation of the same in activities related to BOULDER CORP Climbing. Furthermore, I agree to indemnify, hold harmless and defend BOULDER CORP Climbing from and against any loss, damage, liability, expense, cost and / or attorneys fees, including any of those presented by, on behalf of, related to or caused by any other way by the minor mentioned herein.
I declare that the personal data provided in the application are accurate.

WARNING: A person forging their signature below or misrepresenting the capacity (as a parent or legal guardian, for example) in which you sign will be considered FALSIFIER and, In addition to other civil and criminal penalties, it will be considered that you have agreed to compensate the Released Parties from and against any claim of loss asserted by or on behalf of a person whose visit to the gym was facilitated by that forgery.
I HAVE READ THIS AGREEMENT CAREFULLY AND FULLY UNDERSTAND ITS CONTENT AND IMPLICATIONS.

string-array.name: contract_7
string-array.item: ELECTRONIC SIGNATURE CONSENT

By using this application, you are consenting to the use of your electronic signature instead of an original paper signature. After consent, you can, Upon request, obtain a digital copy. No fee will be charged for such copying and no special hardware or software is required to view it. Your agreement to use a signature electronic communication with us for any document will continue until such time as you notify us by writing that you no longer want to use an electronic signature. There is no penalty for withdrawing your consent. You should always ensure that we have a current email address to communicate with you regarding any changes, if necessary.

string-array.name: recomendaciones
string-array.item: BOULDERING RECOMENDATIONS
Stay away from the mats unless you find yourself climbing or try to keep a safe distance of 2 meters from the wall if you are not climbing, without running.
There should be no person / animal / object on the mats while that someone is climbing.
Eyes wide open and looking at the person (s) who are climbing. The Climbers can fall at any time and without warning.
Use the cats to climb while you are on the wall.
If a climber is on the wall, let him finish before starting.
Don\'t start a route that intersects with another climber\'s route already on the wall.
Try not to bring any object in your pockets, and leave all your jewelry / bracelets / etc ... below
Keep the brushes away from the walls, at least 2 meters.
If someone reaches the top or falls on the road ... this is your chance!
Don\'t brush under a climber in action.
Group climbing: take care of each other and check that the landing zone is clear.
Help promote a safe Boulder environment by sharing tips from safety with the people around you.

string-array.name: recomendaciones_caida
string-array.item: FOR A SAFE FALL
Go down whenever possible, using the grips.
Land on both feet evenly to distribute the impact: collapse your knees and hips to roll on your bottoms like a panda bear.
NEVER land with your legs straight.
ALWAYS avoid rotation when jumping or falling.
Let the mattresses absorb your impact.
Practice falling from a low height, to gain confidence first ;)

string-array.name: objetos_perdidos
string-array.item: TRUNK OF LOST PROPERTY
Although we don\'t really keep them in a trunk;) ... if we keep your forgotten things, if you forgot something, call us immediately! We keep your things as long as possible.

string-array.name: reglas_bouldercitos
string-array.item: RULES FOR LITTLE-BOULDER-ONES
Minors must be supervised at ALL times.
From 8 to 13 years it is mandatory that there is at least one supervisor for every two minors.
ALL children under the age of 13 must be within reach of your supervisor at all times!
IF YOU ARE CLIMBING, YOU ARE NOT SUPERVISING, your little boulder cannot stay alone while you climb.

string-array.name: aceptacion_riesgos
string-array.item: RISK ACCEPTANCE
EVERY climber must sign the responsive before climbing any boulder.
Minors under 18 must have the responsive signed by a parent or legal guardian.

resources.string: accept that i´m in legal age
and like father or tutor of the minor(s) on my charge:
